controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller has the role to act as an intermediary between views and model. It receives all the requests from the view and ask the model to do some operations. At the end, the controller ask the view to update itself.
    Author:
    Vadim Caen, Maria Etegan, Anthony Faraut, Ludmila Danilescu, Marco Montalto, Bernardo Rittmeyer

      • loadPlanXML

        public void loadPlanXML()
        This method asks the views to select a file and send it to the LivraisonManager class, to analyse it. The file should contain a "Plan" in a xml format

      • afficherPlan

        public void afficherPlan()

      • loadDemandeLivrasonsXML

        public void loadDemandeLivrasonsXML()
        This method asks the views to select a file and send it to the LivraisonManager class, to analyse it. The file should contain the "Demande de livraison" in a xml format.

      • afficherDemandeLivraisons

        public void afficherDemandeLivraisons()
        This method indicates the view to update, showing the "demande the livraisons".

      • exceptionOpenFileXML

        public void exceptionOpenFileXML(java.lang.String message)
        This method sends a message to the view. It contains the description of an exception occurred while trying to open xml file.

      • addNouvelleLivraison

        public void addNouvelleLivraison(Noeud adresseNouvelleLivraison,
                        Noeud adresseLivraisonPrecedente,
                        int idClient)
        This method ask the livraison manager to add a new delivrery
        Parameters:
        adresseNouvelleLivraison - is the Noeud where the new delivery will be performed
        adresseLivraisonPrecedente - is the Noeud of the previous delivery
        idClient - is the client id for the new shipping
